online.game
Class chip

java.lang.Object
  online.common.StockArt
      online.game.chip
All Implemented Interfaces:
Drawable, Digestable
Direct Known Subclasses:
CheckerChip, GoChip, hexChip, TabChip
public abstract class chip
extends StockArt
implements Digestable

this is the base class for "chips" which are objects typically placed on boards. Chips inherit from StockArt which supplies the graphic functionality.

chips are typically immutable objects that can be shared among boards. and they are also uniquely identified and digestable. Chips come in sets (of all the types of objects ised in a game) and each chip type should be unique. Chips are typically loaded once and stored in a static variable, so all chips in use will be the same object.

each game typucally subclasses chip with it's particular artwork and characteristics.

Author:
ddyer

Field Detail

randomv

public long randomv
this random number is normally assigned when the chip is created, and is used to identify the chip identity in digests. Note that these "random" numbers are a not really random, but immutable and consistant values associated with each chip, forever.
